text: 1:15-16 Ofa Gami 11:44-45; 19:2; 20:7; Matyu 5:48; 2 Korin 7:1; Hibru 12:14; 2 Pita 3:11Ezɨ Godɨn akɨnafarimɨn osizirim ghaze, “Kɨ arazir kurabar saghon ikia, bar zue, eghtɨ ia uaghan nan mɨn arazir kurabar saghon ikɨ bar zuegh, nan gumazamizibara ikɨ.” Godɨn ian diazim, arazir kuratam an itir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ ia uaghan, ia amir arazitam ikuvighan markɨ. Ia, an gumazamizibara.
